content: @Dave Hill re: drug formulary ri instance, is there anything notable that happened to trigger the issue, or it just went unresponsive all of a sudden?
Nothing has changed in many months. It was working yesterday.

Hmm.. ok yeah, honestly I'm not sure what happened. It hasn't even rebuilt in ~4 months, but the running instance all of a sudden went AWOL and the app process stopped logging. I just forced relaunched a new instance..

Runtime config looks correct and is logging your requests now as expected. In the event outright crashes the process will (start) relaunching in ~5 seconds, but if the process just hangs the orchestratation won't detect it
